document.docAuthor: Hugo Ricardo Secioso Santos, Ulisses Leite Gomes & Patricia Charvet-Almeida
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of whiptail stingray of the genus Dasyatis Rafinesque, 1810 from the Southwestern Atlantic Ocean (Chondrichthyes: Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae).

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of whiptail stingray of the genus Dasyatis Rafinesque, 1810 from the Southwestern Atlantic Ocean (Chondrichthyes: Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae).

subSubSection.paragraph: - MZUSP 3669 (female, 553 mm TL, 190 mm DW); MZUSP uncataloged (male, 785 mm TL, 246 mm DW); MZUSP uncataloged (female, 646 mm TL, 190 mm DW); MZUSP uncataloged (female, 775 mm TL, 233 mm DW); MZUSP uncataloged (female, 701 mm TL, 195 mm DW); MZUSP uncataloged (male, 722 mm TL, 221 mm DW); MZUSP uncataloged (male, 1298 mm TL, 500 mm DW); MZUSP uncataloged (female, 951 mm TL, 250 mm DW); MNRJ 571 (male, 1174 mm TL, 387 mm DW); MNRJ 600 (female, 621 mm TL, 226 mm DW); MNRJ 600 (female, 734 mm TL, 230 mm DW); MNRJ 602 (female, 862 mm TL, 261 mm DW); MNRJ 5712 (female, 699 mm TL, 205 mm DW); MNRJ 15162 (male, 1199 mm TL, 232 mm DW); MNRJ 15162 (female, 769 mm TL, 295 mm DW); UERJ 738 (male, 848 mm TL, 285 mm DW); UERJ 1088 (male, 852 mm TL, 229mm DW); UERJ 1088 (female, 845 mm TL, 256 mm DW); UERJ 1086 (male, 1130 mm TL, 328 mm DW); UERJ 1087 (female, 1300 mm TL, 391 mm DW); AC.
